gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all IKE policies for review.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of IKE policies with their details.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IKE policy for site-to-site VPN.
gold.ideal: Confirmation of the newly created IKE policy with its ID.

gold.user: Admin updating an existing IKE policy to enhance security settings.
gold.ideal: Confirmation of the updated IKE policy with the new settings.

gold.user: Network administrator removing an obsolete IKE policy.
gold.ideal: Confirmation that the IKE policy has been successfully deleted.

gold.user: Security analyst retrieving all IKE proposals for compliance checks.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of IKE proposals with their configurations.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IPSec policy for a VPN.
gold.ideal: Confirmation of the newly created IPSec policy with its ID.

gold.user: Admin making minor adjustments to an existing IPSec policy.
gold.ideal: Confirmation of the partial update with the modified fields.

gold.user: Network administrator deleting an outdated IPSec proposal.
gold.ideal: Confirmation that the IPSec proposal has been successfully deleted.

gold.user: Network operator checking the status of all active tunnels.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of tunnels with their current status and configurations.

gold.user: Admin updating the configuration of a specific tunnel.
gold.ideal: Confirmation of the updated tunnel configuration.

gold.user: Network engineer removing a tunnel that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Confirmation that the tunnel has been successfully deleted.
